sk1.name: Nature's Guise
sk1.desc: Causes the targeted unit to blend in with the forest, becoming invisible to enemies and gaining a movement speed bonus when near a tree. If the unit moves away from a tree or the spell is cast on a unit with no nearby trees, Nature's Guise is lost. Treant Protector can cast spells and remain invisible under Nature's Guise.

sk2.name: Leech Seed
sk2.desc: Treant plants a life-sapping seed in an enemy unit, draining its health, while simultaneously slowing it. The seed heals friendly units around it equal to the amount drained. Pulses 6 times.

sk3.name: Living Armor
sk3.desc: Infuses the target hero or structure with a protective coating which grants bonus regeneration. Also blocks some damage from all sources . Dispels when a number of damage instances are taken.

sk4.name: Overgrowth
sk4.desc: Summons an overgrowth of vines and branches around Treant that prevent afflicted enemies from moving, blinking, going invisible, or attacking.
